title: Start
body:
<<string key false>><<place home>>
{{lumeria,happy}} Down for another round of Bloons TD6?
{{aiko}}Hell yeah!
{{aiko}} What map should we pick?
[[Let’s do the forest map.|transition_2]]
[[Let’s do the ocean map.|transition_1]]

title: transition_1
body:
<<place black>>
 Suddenly, the light flickers out. 
 {{lumeria, confused}} ...Huh, what’s…happening…?
 {{lumeria, confused}}[[Where are we?|forest]]

title: transition_2
body:
<<place black>>
 Suddenly, the light flickers out. 
 {{lumeria, confused}} ...Huh, what’s…happening…?
 {{lumeria, confused}}[[Where are we?|forest]]

title: ocean
body:
<<place ocean>>
 {{aiko}} ...
[[...]]
{{aiko}} …It’s beautiful! 
[[Let’s swim in the water!|bad_end]]
[[What’s that path ahead?|forest]]

title: forest
body:
<<place forest>>
 A forest gleaming in the sunlight unfolds in front of you. 
 {{aiko}} Woah. Now that's a scenery change.
{{lumeria, confused}}Oh my god...what should we do?
[[Let's find a place to stay.| forest_2]]
[[Give me a second.|wait_second]]
[[What's that over there?|item]]

title: wait_second
body:
{{aiko,happy}} Sure!
{{aiko}}...
{{aiko}} Okay...what now?
 [[Let's find a place to stay.| forest_2]]
 [[What's that over there?| item]]

title: item
body:
<<string key true>>
{{lumeria, confused}} What's this...?
{{lumeria}} A key?
{{aiko}} This might be useful.
[[{{aiko}} Anyway... let's keep going!|forest_2]]

title: forest_2
body:
<<place forest_darker>>
 The forest darkens as the day goes by. 
{{lumeria}}The light's fading...
 [[{{aiko}} Let's find somewhere safe before the sun sets. |forest_3]]

title: forest_3
body:
<<place forest_darkest>>
The forest clears into a ominous opening.
 {{aiko,shocked}} Woah...now this is creepy.
{{aiko, shocked}} ... 
{{aiko,shocked}} Don't mind me...I'll just wait here.
{{lumeria}} ...
[[{{aiko}} Ugh, fine...I'll come! Don't look at me like that.|final_room]]

title: final_room
body:
<<place pink_room>> {{aiko, shocked}}...
{{aiko,shocked}} Where are we...?
{{lumeria,confused}} I have no idea. 
 {{aiko,happy}} ...what's that over there? 
 {{lumeria}} It's a gumball machine! 
 [[{{aiko}} I have an idea...let's try using this key in that gumball machine. |good_end]] <<string key == true>> 
 [[{{aiko}} I'm not sure what to do with it though...]] <<string key != true>>
{{lumeria}}...?!
[[{{aiko}} What's happening?! |bad_end]]
